features: HIGH-GRADE MATERIAL. Luxurious 100% polyester voile fabric. We are known for its durability & quality control.
SIZES TO FIT EVERY NEED. Sheer Window Curtain Panels measure 52" wide and are available in lengths of 45", 63", 84", 95".

THE RIGHT BALANCE OF PRIVACY AND LIGHT. Smartly allowing natural light flowing into your room, while still providing privacy. Sheer curtain panels keep your spaces bright and cheerful without worrying about visibility from outside.
NICE DESIGN. Make a pretty soft and natural look to your windows, give your interior spaces a soft, fresh, elegant look by putting up our sheer panels everywhere in your home.
SHEER CURTAINS ARE EASY TO CARE. Machine wash cold, gentle cycle, tumble dry low, light iron as needed.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Functional Sheer Curtains The morning sun shone through our glass and lit up our room. MYSTIC HOME curtains light filtering the glare of the sun and make the room look softer. This sheer White curtains will help to regulate the light during the day, light ray through the sheer curtains opening illuminate the room. Allowing Natural Light Flowing Into Your Room, While Still Providing Privacy,Give You Light & Airy Feel Minimalist pure sheer white curtain, let us feel a cool and refreshing in sorching summer. This sheer curtain is suitable for all scenes: Yard, Patio, Villa, Parlor. Product Features: 1.Material: Luxurious 100% polyester voile fabric. 2.Colors Option: Burgundy 3.Package Includes: 2 panels in each package. Each package contains two sheer panels. 4.Occasions: Home/ Living room/ Bedroom/Kids room/ Yard/ Patio/ Parlor/ Sliding door/ Villa.

Sheer Curtains Details Semi Sheer Curtains & Luxury Material MYSTIC HOME CURTAINS is mainly made with high-grade voile fabric, Luxurious 100% polyester voile fabric classical and refining design.Durable Curtains! We are known for its durability & quality control. Workmanship Presents A Visual Feast Our Sheer Curtains are thicker than ordinary sheers, yet still allow sunlight and air to flow through your home. You'll love the way these lightweight, billowy panels look blowing in a gentle breeze. Extremely Beautiful Design & Work Process High quality workmanship, and every thread is handmade and subjected to strict quality control throughout the production process.These semi sheer curtains will certainly upgrade your home décor at no cost.

Perfect workmanship presents a visual feast - Mainly made with high-grade voile fabric, classical and refining design. - Our Sheer Curtains are thicker than ordinary sheers, yet still allow sunlight and air to flow through your home. You'll love the way these lightweight, billowy panels look blowing in a gentle breeze. - The Right Balance of Privacy and Light. Keep your spaces bright and cheerful without worrying about visibility from outside. - Transform the look of your interior spaces by putting up our sheer panels. - Durable Curtains! We are known for its durability & quality control. - Simple care. No fuss, just toss into the washing machine, tumble dry on low, and give them a quick iron if needed.

Sheer curtains are suitable for various scenes. Sheer curtains are versatile and suitable for various settings, including residential, commercial, outdoor, and event spaces. They add a touch of elegance and create a cozy atmosphere. Whether it's in bedrooms, living rooms, offices, outdoor areas, or event venues, sheer curtains enhance the decor and provide a pleasant ambiance for relaxation, entertainment, or special occasions.

Sheer curtains come in a variety of colors, offering you numerous options to enhance your home decor and add more joy to your life. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These sheers are well made and affordable! They look great and are sheer enough that I can kind of see what’s behind it - but not in full detail. The doors to a toy cabinet I had m happened to break off and were not repairable - so I bought these to hang in place of the doors. I love the look and they are exactly what I needed. Would you again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect quality for the price and service
reviews.reviewText: I ordered these 45" long curtain on 6/22 and they arrived today 6/24 in great packaging for an unbelievably inexpensive price. I dampened the panels briefly in the shower and then dried about 15 minutes on delicate cycle to eliminate the creases from packaging and shipment. They were so easy to hang from a simple gold rod, absolutely no wrinkles or creases. I love the subtle sheer weave, perfect covering my colored metal blinds over my computer desk. The right amount of light, barely transparent fabric, hanging perfectly with no hassle, no fuss, no problems. It's a wonderful product at such a budget price, so I'll be ordering more sets of the same longer panels for my larger windows. I am happy I found Mystic Home curtains on Amazon. Mystic Home service is fantastic! Thank you! (:

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality at a great price.
reviews.reviewText: I ordered these curtains for my bedroom. I needed something that allowed a lot of light but still gave privacy. I started with 2 panels in each window and then decided to add 1 more panel to each window. They really added a nice touch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent little curtains.
reviews.reviewText: Simple and pretty. Not fancy but look nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I wasn't hoping for much as the cost was low and they are for a fort.... but these drapes are pretty nice! Sheer and yet a tad textured, they don't feel cheap at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Sheer For Privacy Yet Elegant
reviews.reviewText: Got this for our spare room which I'm actively in crafting, billing, makeup, etc. It's perfect for privacy but looks elegant at the same time. The material holds up very nicely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wrinkle Free and Great Value for the Money
reviews.reviewText: We first tried sheer curtains from a big box store that starts with "W" and they were subpar. Good price, but poor quality and wrinkles galore. Based on the reviews, we purchased these and they are wonderful. Nice thick material while also being sheer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and thick, no smell
reviews.reviewText: Once I got them I put them into the dryer on low heat for a few minutes to get the wrinkles out and put them up. No smell at all. They are thick so the ceiling fan doesn’t blow them around. But they still let in all the natural light from outside.
For the price these are very nice sheer curtains. Put them up in a guest bedroom and they look very nice.
Se ven de buena calidad y me gustaron mucho.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 4, 2021

reviews.reviewText: Bought them to use in the winter time to let the light in more and be able to see outside. They are just the perfect window covering without blocking the sun coming in for the winter months. We use darkening curtains all summer so nice to find something that I can see out when working away in the house. Bought a couple lengths. Happy with them all.

These are pure bright white color. Comparing to other white curtains, these are whiter. They hang nicely, but you have to iron them. Like any curtain, iron them and they look good. Buy at least 2 times width of your window.
